::Koj::

Koj sees the Missiles heading for Inu-Yasha and Fires some Ninja starts 
stoping one. Koj turns to hangs on for dear life as he gets hit by the optic 
blast his causeing his as his shoulder plate cracks. The Fang starts to suck 
the power out of Oblitertron. "Inu-Yasha use your mega Flares."


::Inu-Yasha::

Inu-Yasha fires one blast stoping the missile but gets hit by the optic 
blast his chest burning Fires four Mega Flares two at Treadshot and 2 at 
Oblitertron.

::Koj::

Koj feels the fang gaining power it continues eating through the hand until 
it is removed out pure rage and hunger as his wounds slowly start to close. 
Koj,the Fang and the hand fall towards the earth.
